meanings.sent1: The interdicted area was off-limits to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The interdicted items were not allowed to be brought into the building.
meanings.sent3: The interdicted candy was too tempting for the children to resist.
meanings.sent4: The interdicted path was like a closed door, preventing any passage.
meanings.sent5: The interdicted zone was marked with clear warning signs.

meanings.sent1: The interdicted road was closed due to construction.
meanings.sent2: The interdicted tunnel was impassable due to a landslide.
meanings.sent3: The interdicted stream was dammed up by fallen trees.
meanings.sent4: The interdicted doorway was barricaded with heavy furniture.
meanings.sent5: The interdicted path was completely blocked by fallen rocks.

meanings.sent1: The school interdicted students from using their phones during class.
meanings.sent2: The judge interdicted the defendant from contacting the victim.
meanings.sent3: The mayor interdicted the use of fireworks in the park.
meanings.sent4: The company interdicted smoking on its premises.
meanings.sent5: The government interdicted the sale of certain medications without a prescription.
